name: Soviet Union
startIntroPart1: You are the head of the CPSU
startIntroPart2: Promote your nation to true socialism, do not let the bourgeoisie take over the whole world!!!
neutralHello: Hello, would you like to join the union?
hateHello: What do YOU want from us!?
tradeRequest: I have an offer for you
declaringWar: You did not want to join the union voluntarily, Now we will force you to join by force
attacked: Would you like to join us?
defeated: You are worthy of taking care of the union
